extends Object

      protected Channel(String name, String shortName, String prefix, org.bukkit.permissions.Permission perm)
      Use this constructor if you wish to use the default format
        Channel(String name, String shortName, String prefix, org.bukkit.permissions.Permission perm, String format)
      Use this constructor if you wish to set your own format for this channel

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected void addPlayer(ChatPlayer p)
      This method wil call forceAddPlayer(ChatPlayer), it is primarily here to be overridden for things like password checks
      protected String applyDefaultFormat(ChatPlayer from, String msg, String format) 
      protected void forceAddPlayer(ChatPlayer p)
      This should only be called if you want to add the player based on a permission or other system rather then a player joining a channel of their own accord
      protected abstract String format(ChatPlayer from, String msg, String format)
      This must be implemented by all channels, by default it should return applyDefaultFormat(ChatPlayer, String, String) This is can be used to apply extra per channel formatting tags
      org.bukkit.permissions.Permission getAutoJoinPermission() 
      String getFormat() 
      String getName() 
      org.bukkit.permissions.Permission getPermission() 
      protected List<ChatPlayer> getRecipients(ChatPlayer p)
      Returns the players that will receive a message if it was sent by p By default this returns the list of players in the channel this is overridden by other channels to specify distance or faction association
      org.bukkit.permissions.Permission getSetMainPermission() 
      String getShortName() 
      void sendMessage(ChatPlayer from, String msg, String format)
      Sends a message to the recipients of the channel NOTE: The format must already be filled in, use format(ChatPlayer, String, String) to apply the format

        protected List<ChatPlayer> players

    • Constructor Detail

      • Channel

        protected Channel(String name,
                  String shortName,
                  String prefix,
                  org.bukkit.permissions.Permission perm)
        Use this constructor if you wish to use the default format
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the channel
        shortName - The name that can be used to join the channel
        prefix - The prefix shown in chat
        perm - The permission required to join the channel

      • Channel

        public Channel(String name,
               String shortName,
               String prefix,
               org.bukkit.permissions.Permission perm,
               String format)
        Use this constructor if you wish to set your own format for this channel
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the channel
        shortName - The name that can be used to join the channel
        prefix - The prefix shown in chat
        perm - The permission required to join the channel
        format - The format that you wish to use for this channel

    • Method Detail

      • getFormat

        public String getFormat()
        Returns:
        Returns the current format for this channel

      • addPlayer

        protected void addPlayer(ChatPlayer p)
        This method wil call forceAddPlayer(ChatPlayer), it is primarily here to be overridden for things like password checks
        Parameters:
        p - The player to add to this channel

      • forceAddPlayer

        protected void forceAddPlayer(ChatPlayer p)
        This should only be called if you want to add the player based on a permission or other system rather then a player joining a channel of their own accord
        Parameters:
        p - The player to add to this channel

      • getRecipients

        protected List<ChatPlayer> getRecipients(ChatPlayer p)
        Returns the players that will receive a message if it was sent by p By default this returns the list of players in the channel this is overridden by other channels to specify distance or faction association
        Parameters:
        p - the player sending a message to the channel
        Returns:
        Returns a list of ChatPlayers that will receive the message

      • getName

        public String getName()
        Returns:
        Returns the full name of the channel

      • getShortName

        public String getShortName()
        Returns:
        Returns the short name of the channel

      • getPermission

        public org.bukkit.permissions.Permission getPermission()
        Returns:
        Returns the permission required to join this channel

      • getAutoJoinPermission

        public org.bukkit.permissions.Permission getAutoJoinPermission()
        Returns:
        Returns the permission required to be added to this channel on first join

      • getSetMainPermission

        public org.bukkit.permissions.Permission getSetMainPermission()
        Returns:
        Returns the permission required to have this channel set as your main channel on every join

      • sendMessage

        public void sendMessage(ChatPlayer from,
                        String msg,
                        String format)
        Sends a message to the recipients of the channel NOTE: The format must already be filled in, use format(ChatPlayer, String, String) to apply the format
        Parameters:
        from - The ChatPlayer that has sent the message
        msg - The message being sent
        format - The finalised format

      • applyDefaultFormat

        protected String applyDefaultFormat(ChatPlayer from,
                                    String msg,
                                    String format)
        Parameters:
        from - The ChatPlayer sending the message
        msg - The message being sent
        format - The format being used
        Returns:
        Returns the formatted message to be sent to recipients

      • format

        protected abstract String format(ChatPlayer from,
                                 String msg,
                                 String format)
        This must be implemented by all channels, by default it should return applyDefaultFormat(ChatPlayer, String, String) This is can be used to apply extra per channel formatting tags
        Parameters:
        from - The ChatPlayer sending the message
        msg - The message being sent
        format - The raw format to be applied
        Returns:
        Returns the formatted message for this channel
